item.description:
This was a lot of fun last year. It happens quick and it tends to be a bit chilly and early in the morning.  I would suggest bringing an ND6 or ND8 filter and perhaps a Grad ND filter or Polarized filter.  We will be able to get pictures of the pilots setting up their balloons for launch and then afterwards the launching of all the balloons.

 

 

FREE PARKING AT HUDSON ELKS
AND HUDSON HIGH SCHOOL

91 Park Street
Hudson, MA 01749
978 568-8129

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Interested in getting a little more in the action?

 

A limited number of rides at the festival will be available for booking. Flights must be pre-booked and pre-paid prior to the festival using the attached form. Flights will not be available for booking at the festival. All passengers must be able to enter and exit the balloon basket without assistance. Limit of two passengers per balloon. Passengers must arrive one hour prior to scheduled flight time and will be required to sign a passenger insurance form, emailed by the pilot.

Contact: Bill Hopkins
Phone.: (508) 864-4870
Payment: Check Only
item.how_to_find_us: Meeting in the parking lot right at 5 and then moving into the field as soon as possible. 1-800-210-9531 to reach either Pat or Mike.
item.name: Hudson Elks 7th Annual Balloon Festival 2011
